title: Ticket #3503: improve proxy delegation strength
description: condor uses the default attributes when creating a proxy. we should allow a user to specify the strength of the proxy that is delegated, on the receiving side, by setting GSI_DELEGATION_KEYBITS in the condor_config.
remarks:
2013-Feb-28 10:43:54 by jfrey:
Code Review

This change looks good.

2013-Nov-05 18:27:13 by sfiligoi:
I just looked into more details of this (sorry for being so late).

Why is this a receiver-only knob? It would seem to me that the sender should have a say on what is being delegated as well. It is the sender's proxy that is being delegated!

Can we please reopen this ticket?

Thanks, Igor
